}}'''''Assault on Dolni Keep''''' is a text-adventure  video game made by [[Tom Zuchowski]].<ref>[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=rw9quntgskgb91gg The Interactive Fiction Database] (retrieved 28 October 2010)</ref> It is the sequel to ''[[Thror's Ring]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> Orcs have captured an Elf lord, and the player has to free him.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
